name: circle dodger (ghhosty)
description:
have you ever wanted to dodge circles? no? too bad. because this game is about a radical concept you'd never think of. you should play the game to find out

i will also release a sequel at 1000 downloads

quotes (for legal purposes these people did not actually say these things and are just for the funny):

insane graphics - the banana god

10/10 even tho i havent played - homeless man
